title: Magic Kingdom
description: Test your knowledge of the most magical place!

questions.question: How many lands are in Magic Kingdom?
questions.explanation: Magic Kingdom has 6 lands: Main Street U.S.A., Adventureland, Frontierland, Liberty Square, Fantasyland, and Tomorrowland.

questions.question: There are underground tunnels (utilidors) beneath Magic Kingdom.
questions.explanation: The utilidors allow cast members to move around unseen and maintain the magic for guests.

questions.question: What land features Big Thunder Mountain Railroad?
questions.explanation: Big Thunder Mountain Railroad is located in Frontierland, themed as 'the wildest ride in the wilderness.'

questions.question: What is the name of the nighttime fireworks show at Magic Kingdom?
questions.explanation: Happily Ever After is the current nighttime spectacular featuring fireworks and projection mapping on the castle.

questions.question: Where can you find the Haunted Mansion at Magic Kingdom?
questions.explanation: The Haunted Mansion is in Liberty Square at Magic Kingdom (and New Orleans Square at Disneyland).

questions.question: You can buy gum at Magic Kingdom.
questions.explanation: Disney parks don't sell gum to help keep the parks clean and prevent gum from getting stuck on attractions.

questions.question: What is the fastest ride at Magic Kingdom?
questions.explanation: TRON Lightcycle Run reaches speeds of 59 mph, making it the fastest ride in Magic Kingdom.

questions.question: What restaurant is located inside Cinderella Castle?
questions.explanation: Cinderella's Royal Table is a character dining experience located inside the iconic castle.
